channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Meta社は2024年8月にCrowdTangleを閉鎖し、Meta Content Libraryに置き換える予定。
item.description:
Jeff Horwitz / Wall Street Journal:
Meta plans to shut down CrowdTangle in August 2024 and replace it with Meta Content Library, available to academic and nonprofit researchers, not news outlets  —  CrowdTangle, a source for embarrassing articles about Facebook and Instagram, has been used to track conspiracy theories, viral content

item.title: アマゾンは、ユーザーが買えなかった商品の広告費を支払った販売者は「ごく一部」であるとし、修正を約束した。アマゾンは、30万ドルを求める販売者に1万5000ドルの返金を申し出た（Spencer Soper/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Spencer Soper / Bloomberg:
Amazon says “a tiny fraction” of sellers paid for ads for products users couldn't buy and pledges a fix; Amazon offered a $15K refund to a seller seeking $300K  —  The company has pledged to reimburse sellers for the mistake and make fixes to its lucrative advertising operation.

item.title: UAEが支援するレッドバードのテレグラフ社入札を阻止するため、英国保守党はどのように戦ったのか？
item.description:
Financial Times:
How the UK Conservative party establishment fought to frustrate RedBird's UAE-backed Telegraph bid; sources say Business Secretary Kemi Badenoch had a key role  —  Rishi Sunak's ‘hand was forced’ as PM acts to change law to stop foreign states from buying media groups

item.title: 米国の有料音楽配信契約者数、2023年に過去最高の1億900万人に、SiriusXMとAmazon Prime Musicを含めると1億3600万人に増加、米国のミレニアル世代の10人に7人が有料配信契約（Russ Crupnick/MusicWatch）
item.description:
Russ Crupnick / MusicWatch:
US paid music subscribers hit a record 109M in 2023, rising to 136M including SiriusXM and Amazon Prime Music; seven of every 10 US millennials pay to subscribe  —  MusicWatch Annual Music Study points to continued health of the US music market, a record number of paid subscribers, and increased spend on recorded music.

item.title: バイトダンスの投資家は、TikTokがなければ同社の価値はどうなるかを再評価し、TikTokは2023年に〜200億ドルの収益で数十億ドルの損失を出すと見積もっている（The Information）。
item.description:
The Information:
ByteDance investors, reassessing what the company's value would be without TikTok, estimate that TikTok lost several billion dollars in 2023 on revenue of ~$20B  —  TikTok, facing a growing threat of a U.S. ban, has been a global juggernaut over the past few years, drawing more than a billion monthly users …

item.title: 情報源GoogleのSearch Generative Experienceは、パブリッシャーへのオーガニック検索トラフィックを20％から60％削減する可能性がある。
item.description:
Trishla Ostwal / Adweek:
Sources: Google's Search Generative Experience could cut organic search traffic to publishers by 20% to 60%; Google says estimating the impact is premature  —  Search Generative Experience could upend over 60% of publishers' total organic traffic  —  Google launched its artificial intelligence …

item.title: 米国史上最悪の企業合併といわれるAOL合併を監督したタイムワーナー元CEOのジェラルド・M・レヴィン氏が13日、84歳で死去した（Chris Kornelis/New York Times）。
item.description:
Chris Kornelis / New York Times:
Gerald M. Levin, the former Time Warner CEO who oversaw the AOL merger, widely considered the worst corporate merger in US history, died on March 13 at age 84  —  He was called a visionary in cable television, but his foray into the world of the internet, in a marriage with AOL, proved disastrous.

item.title: 情報筋ディズニーは、ボブ・アイガーCEOの最終的な後継者探しで、部門責任者のダナ・ウォルデン、ジミー・ピタロ、ジョシュ・ダマロ、アラン・バーグマンに注目している（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Disney is focusing on divisional heads Dana Walden, Jimmy Pitaro, Josh D'Amaro, and Alan Bergman in a search for an eventual successor to CEO Bob Iger  —  Walt Disney Co.'s board is focusing on four divisional heads as part of a formal search for an eventual successor …

item.title: 申請中：パラマウント・グローバルがインドのメディア企業Viacom18の株式13％をリライアンスに5億1700万ドルで売却することで合意、リライアンスの持ち株比率は70.49％に上昇（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Filing: Paramount Global has agreed to sell its 13% stake in Indian media house Viacom18 to Reliance for $517M, raising Reliance's stake to 70.49%  —  Mukesh Ambani's Reliance is buying Paramount Global's 13% stake in Viacom18 for $517 million as Asia's richest man broadens his entertainment business …

item.title: 情報筋ドン・レモンは、イーロン・マスクが契約を破棄するまでは、厳密にはXとの契約を結んでいなかった。レモンは3月18日にマスクとのインタビューをYouTubeに掲載する予定（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Sources: Don Lemon had not technically inked an X contract before Elon Musk killed the deal; Lemon plans to post his interview with Musk on March 18 on YouTube  —  The Scoop  —  Elon Musk and Don Lemon are escalating towards what could be a bitter contract dispute after X's owner abruptly terminated …

item.title: クレムリン系のRIAノーボスチによると、ロシアは放送局Dozhdの元EICであるミハイル・ザイガルをロシア軍の残虐行為に関する「フェイクニュース」を広めた罪で起訴した（モスクワ・タイムズ）。
item.description:
The Moscow Times:
Kremlin-linked RIA Novosti says Russia has charged Mikhail Zygar, former EIC of broadcaster Dozhd, with spreading “fake news” about Russian army atrocities  —  Russian authorities have pressed criminal charges against journalist Mikhail Zygar for spreading “fake news” …

item.title: ナショナル・トラスト・フォー・ローカル・ニュースは中古の印刷機を購入し、コロラド・コミュニティ・メディアの新聞の印刷を担当するためにデンバーに移動させる計画だ（Corey Hutchins/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Corey Hutchins / Nieman Lab:
The National Trust for Local News bought a used printing press and plans to move it to Denver to handle printing for Colorado Community Media's newspapers  —  “Demand has gone down for printed newspapers, but the supply chain for providing newspapers in a printed format is collapsing faster …

item.title: 米下院は、アプリの販売または禁止を強制する超党派のTikTok法案を可決。同法案は、同伴法案のない上院の先行きは不透明だ（Cristiano Lima-Strong/Washington Post）
item.description:
Cristiano Lima-Strong / Washington Post:
The US House passes a bipartisan TikTok bill that forces a sale or ban of the app; the legislation faces an uncertain Senate path without a companion measure  —  The swift rebuke shifts attention to the Senate, where the bill faces significant political barriers and constitutional concerns

item.title: OpenAIがLe MondeとPrisa Mediaとの提携を発表、フランス語とスペイン語のニュースコンテンツをChatGPTに提供し、OpenAIのモデルのトレーニングを支援（Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Shirin Ghaffary / Bloomberg:
OpenAI announces partnerships with Le Monde and Prisa Media to bring French and Spanish language news content to ChatGPT and help train OpenAI's models  —  Why Are Deepfakes Everywhere?  Can They Be Stopped?  —  QuickTake  —  What Is Bitcoin ‘Halving’ and Does It Push Up the Cryptocurrency's Price?

item.title: ケイト・ミドルトンの病気療養中の取材をめぐる英国メディアの極端な嗜好は、メーガン・マークル報道における二重基準を浮き彫りにしている（Zeynep Tufekci/New York Times）
item.description:
Zeynep Tufekci / New York Times:
The UK media's extreme deference over covering Kate Middleton during her medical absence highlights its double standards in its Meghan Markle coverage  —  “Where Is Kate Middleton?” yet another headline blared on Monday.  The public speculation following her unspecified abdominal surgery …
